page.title: 10Farming in S/W Dartmoor.
page.content: There is quite a lot of farming in the area.Most farms keep sheep.The sheep are both branded and sprayed with a colour,some farmers have cows, which are usually Friesian,for their milk,cream and butter.Lots of farmers keep moorland ponies for a hobby and they are branded with the owner's initials.They are usually Dartmoor Ponies and are found in herds.Most farmers grow corn to send to buyers.There are a few farmers who keep pigs for pork but there are no farms completely for pigs.Sometimes, if the farmers think that the weather is right,they will grow things like cabbages,swede,kale,potatoes and parsnip.
